name: GKFriendsAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants that indicate if the local player grants access to their friends list.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The player authorized your game to access their list of friends.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: Access to the player’s friends’ data denied.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The player hasn’t choosen whether your game may access their friends list.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: Access to the player’s list of friends restricted.
